Select the humorous alteration that 'distorts' the title of the movie or the name of the musical artist.
Identify the whimsical modification that 'ruins' the title of the movie or the name of the music artist.
Select the humorous twist that alters the title of the movie or musical artist.
Select the humorous alteration that distorts the title of the movie or the name of the musical artist.
Locate the unconventional alteration that 'spoils' the title of the film or musical artist.
